name: Lost In Tales
description:
What happens when a story doesn't end? It does everything to finish.

Even if it's with the end of who created it. Isabel is the granddaughter of a famous novelist who created the literary series Lost in Tales, which was a huge success on TV in the 80s. A series that has not ended and now its protagonists want freedom.

At any cost.

Spending a season at her grandmother's house, Marjorie will have to face dark threats, gothic labyrinths, ghosts and even... mushrooms.Lost in Tales is a deep dive into the aesthetics of 80's retro gaming, gothic literature and a dark version of Alice in Wonderland and the Wizard of Oz. And it's also the first demo by Fuerza Games.

A new story starts here.
And you know how it is, it's better to finish, otherwise...
